movies.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
movies.overview: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career. Based on a true story about a man's pursuit of success against all odds, showing perseverance, family bonds, and faith in difficult times.

movies.title: The Blind Side
movies.overview: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player with the help of a caring woman and her family. A powerful story of compassion, family, and community coming together.

movies.title: 12 Angry Men
movies.overview: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence. A powerful examination of justice, truth, and standing up for what is right.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.overview: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis. A profound story of sacrifice, courage, and saving lives.

movies.title: Life is Beautiful
movies.overview: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses humor and imagination to protect his son from the horrors. A touching story of love, sacrifice, and maintaining hope in dark times.
